name: Plat404mer
description:
Plat404mer is a minimalist, momentum focused platformer with  a total of 55 levels.  

The main difference between this game and other platformers is that Plat404mer is entirely condensed in one screen, with the sides of that screen  providing a wall-jump mechanic  for extra height. It's hard difficulty will definitely provide a challenge, but it's unique difficulty options should accommodate for most players.    This game is well suited for speedruns, as it has a built-in timer,  bouncy physics,   and momentum that carries over from one level to the next.

Plat404mer is out now!

Honest feedback is appreciated!
